title: How to Make a Glue Tile

steps.headline: Gather your materials.
steps.description: You'll find a list of them under "Things You'll Need."

steps.headline: Trace the bottom of the plastic cup onto the paper.
Using the marker, color the bottom of the cup.
steps.description: It is very important that the marker color is darker than the paper color.

steps.headline: Cover the bottom with a layer of white glue.
Place the paper cutout over it and press down slightly.
Once the glue is dry, peel off the paper.
steps.description: The bottom should be a shinier version of the paper tinted the marker color, with concentrated spots of the marker color. It will feel like plastic and is sure to get you a good grade!

text: Gather your materials. You'll find a list of them under "Things You'll Need." Trace the bottom of the plastic cup onto the paper. Cut it out. Using the marker, color the bottom of the cup. It is very important that the marker color is darker than the paper color. Cover the bottom with a layer of white glue.  Place the paper cutout over it and press down slightly.  Once the glue is dry, peel off the paper. The bottom should be a shinier version of the paper tinted the marker color, with concentrated spots of the marker color. It will feel like plastic and is sure to get you a good grade! Finished.
